entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 6:47AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINDY AND WET FRIDAY INTO FRIDAY NIGHT... While rain moves into the region Thursday night, a new storm from the south will intensify rains and bring strong winds for much of the southern Panhandle coastal region. The storm brings gusts to 45 mph Friday with the potential of 50+ mph winds Friday night. Up to 1 to 2 inches of rain will fall with the system. Continued
